comment.author: 46696233@N00
comment._content:
According to ftp://ftp.rootsweb.com/pub/usgenweb/hi/military/pearl.txt  these were all the soldiers with the last name Young who died at Pearl Harbor:

YOUNG, Eric Reed                   ENS        USN
YOUNG, Glendale Rex                S1c        USN
YOUNG, Jay Wesley                  S1c        USN
YOUNG, Martin Daymond              F2c        USN
YOUNG, Robert Verdun               S1c        USN
YOUNG, Virgil Jarrett              PVT        USA
YOUNG, Vivan Louis                 WT1c       USN
